channel.title: Why does the iPhone load mobile themes?
channel.description: I'm on my phone so forgive the structure of this topic. How do websites know I'm on my iPhone? I hate all mobile themes and would much rather load the normal sites, I'm aware that the mobile sites use less memory/bandwith. I'm looking for a solution to always load normal pages.
